headline: Friday's big stock stories: What’s likely to move the market in the next trading session
summary: The Dow Industrials lost more than 260 points on Thursday as fears over private credit and simmering tensions between the U.S. and Iran weighed on the market.

headline: Assessing APA Corporation (APA) Valuation As Analyst Sentiment Shifts And Dividend Is Reaffirmed
summary: Recent attention on APA (APA) has been driven by mixed analyst views regarding upcoming Q4 2025 results and an affirmed regular cash dividend of $0.25 per share, payable in late May 2026. See our latest analysis for APA. APA’s recent 4.65% 1 day share price return and 10.98% 30 day share price return, taking the stock to $28.61, come after mixed analyst views and the reaffirmed dividend. The 27.55% 1 year total shareholder return contrasts with a weaker 3 year total shareholder return of...
